resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103722</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103722</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207012</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water: A Source of Life and Culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser: Eine Quelle des Lebens und der 
Kultur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau : Une source de vie et culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água: Uma fonte da vida e da cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua: Una sorgente di vita e di coltura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ: Μια πηγή ζωής και πολιτισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua: Una fuente de la vida y de la cultura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">asks students to research and analyze the role of water in daily life and create symbols to represent their findings. The students' symbols are then arranged to create a contemporary work of art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bittet Kursteilnehmer, die Rolle des Wassers in 
der täglichen Lebensdauer zu erforschen und zu analysieren und 
Symbole zu erstellen, um ihre Entdeckungen darzustellen. Die 
Symbole der Kursteilnehmer werden dann geordnet, um ein 
zeitgenössisches Kunstwerk zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">demande à des étudiants de rechercher et 
analyser le rôle de l'eau dans la vie quotidienne et de créer des 
symboles pour représenter leurs résultats. Les symboles des 
étudiants sont alors arrangés pour créer une oeuvre d'art 
contemporaine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pede que os estudantes pesquisem e analisem o 
papel da água na vida diária e críem símbolos para representar 
seus findings. Os símbolos dos estudantes são arranjados 
então para criar um trabalho de arte contemporary.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiede agli allievi di ricercare ed analizzare il 
ruolo di acqua nella vita quotidiana e di creare i simboli per 
rappresentare i loro risultati. I simboli degli allievi allora 
sono organizzati per creare un'opera d'arte contemporanea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρωτά τους σπουδαστές στην έρευνα και αναλύει το ρόλο 
του ύδατος στην καθημερινή ζωή και δημιουργεί τα σύμβολα για να 
αντιπροσωπεύσει τα συμπεράσματά τους. Τα σύμβολα των 
σπουδαστών κανονίζονται έπειτα για να δημιουργήσουν ένα σύγχρονο
έργο της τέχνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pide que los estudiantes investiguen y que 
analicen el papel del agua en vida de cada día y que creen símbolos 
para representar sus resultados. Los símbolos de los 
estudiantes entonces se arreglan para crear una obra de arte 
contemporánea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207012</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103722</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-a-source-of-life-and-culture</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
